website_summaries.verdict: This high-performance blender makes light work of anything you can throw at it, but it does have a sizable price tag.
pros: Offers 9-speed dial controls with on/off and pulse buttons
Equipped with a powerful three-horsepower motor
Sturdy die-cast metal base is highly durable
cons: Could use a few more color choices besides black, white, and gray

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: After wasting so much money on other brands blenders which always end up breaking after 1 to 2 months, I decided to invest and buy this one but to my surprise, I have only used this blender to blend fresh red pepper and tomato for sauce for about 5 to 6 times since I bought it, the pitcher is already turning red, this is upsetting and doesn’t worth the price of this machine. I also think it should come with additional pitcher that is wide enough to make something like dough.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: This blender rocks! Replaced a Vitamix and it’s really superior blending and using daily to make smoothies. Highly recommend this model, lots of power, base is solid and doesn’t move when blending at any speed. Want to purchase another one already, you won’t be disappointed with this. While a bit pricey, it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. West

customer_reviews.title: Powerful stable blender
customer_reviews.text: This blender has variable speed and is very quiet at the lower speeds. It revs up at full speed and stays in place without skittering around the counter. It is very easy to clean, so I use it more than my old one. I'm counting on many years of use, with its reputation for being well made.
customer_reviews.author: L inda

customer_reviews.title: power
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome, way better than you will get from any other machine! and what a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender so much. Smoothies are better than Jamba Juice!
customer_reviews.author: Teri K. Wedel

customer_reviews.title: It is so beautiful for an appliance!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love it! And it is so powerful, everything is so creamy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: So far this beast is great
customer_reviews.text: This is a giant blender but at least it looks stylish on the counter. You will not want to drag the 20 pound base out of your cabinets if you plan to store it. Works very very well. No programmable buttons but that version costs $150 more although it is 3.5HP rather than this one at 3.0HP, which is plenty. It has a 10 year "no hassle" warranty and that is why I bought it over a Vitamix. Before this I bought a Cuisinart that broke in 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Uturn

customer_reviews.title: Good looking-loose container
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, but container has nothing to hold it on—very loose and precarious, must hold onto it when machine is running. I called KitchenAid—they said this is the way it’s made.
customer_reviews.author: Please--no name.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome so far. The throttle controls are great. Very heavy duty machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is big and heavy. It's too big to be lifting out of a bottom cabinet. Very powerful and easy to use. It's seems quite industrial in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: sj wilde

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. This is pro blender with a thick cord, high power motor. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bill givens

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely powerful and heavy duty. The base is very heavy so its best to find a place for it on your countertops. Unfortunately I have lots of low cabinets and the blender is too tall to find under so I store it in my pantry. The pitcher is plastic which was surprising considering the price point. I expected glass but the plastic is very thick and sturdy. Blends and grinds with ease just as I expected. I found that using a bottle brush is the easiest and safest way to clean the blades and underneath it. Overall, extremely powerful, heavy duty and sturdy blender.
customer_reviews.author: PartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: Needs longer cord, but real tough
customer_reviews.text: I like how tough this is, but the short cord made it difficult for me to find a place to plug it in for the room I needed it for. I had to buy a plug strip. Very tough glass. The controls and settings are simple to figure out. Nice solid base. The blades were tough and made blending ice for margaritas a breeze. Easy to take off base and a quick clean. Easy to read measurements on the side are really helpful. If I do get a second one I will search for a longer cord.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This is the finest blender ive ever used. I love this thing. It blends smooth and evenly. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky A.

customer_reviews.title: Motor seems as strong 💪🏼 as a race car!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine through Target. This makes the best smoothies! They are fluffy and foamy, like at Jamba Juice! Much better than my old Black & Decker. Definitely lives up to the Professional Model name. I find it easy to use & simple to set up. My sister-in-law has a Wolf brand blender which I used a few days ago. I thought I would see if the Kitchen Aid would be just was good for almost half the price! Yes it delivers and will be used for many years to come. Crushes ice like nobody’s business! I’m very happy & would definitely recommend it. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Gololo

customer_reviews.title: I SO wanted to love this blender...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so this is my 3rd blender after returning a Vitamix and a Blentec! I REALLY wanted to love this blender, but unfortunately will have to return this one too! I make bulletproof hot coffee every morning that needs to be blended. Sadly, every time I blend with this blender on the lowest speed, it has a hickup before starting then shoots hot coffee out the top!! OMG this is so dangerous!! SO disappointed! :(
customer_reviews.author: M. Battle

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CHOICE IF YOU BLEND A LOT
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty blender that performs well, and may be worth it if you blend a lot. It's an attractive design, which is good if you leave it out on the counter. And you won't want to be dragging it out of a cabinet, because it weighs a lot. Not a criticism, just a statement of fact . I expect a quality blender to be heavy. The cord is surprisingly short, my only real criticism. Worth the price of you blend a lot, probably not if you use occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: KitchenAid High Performance Series Blender, One Size, Black Matte
product_meta.description: Color:Matte BlackExplore every taste and texture with the KitchenAid High Performance Series Blender. This blender features a range of variable speeds (1-9), a powerful 3.0 Peak HP motor with stainless blade and simple controls for all of your healthy blends. With the die cast metal base and controls and commercial grade components, this blender is durable and long lasting. The KSB6060 includes 1 blender jar, 1 ingredient measuring cap and 1 tamper.
feature_bullets: Achieve your ideal texture with a range of variable speeds 1-9, powerful 3.0 peak HP motor and tamper.
Optimal performance with the blender's powerful 3.0 peak HP motor and stainless steel blade for every blend.
Simple controls - just one dial and two switches
Tamper helps push ingredients into the blending vortex for a smooth finish
Comes with blender jar, ingredient measuring cap and tamper
Included components: Blender, Jar, Lid, Tamper

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
